@template public
{{div: class=white}}
{{div2: class=container}}

@col 12

h1. Pricing
{{html:
<br>
<ul class="nav nav-tabs tabOfPrice">
  <li class="active"><a href="#home" data-toggle="tab">Linux</a></li>
  <li><a href="#profile" data-toggle="tab">Windows</a></li>
  
</ul>


<div class="tab-content">
  <div class="tab-pane fade in active" id="home">
}}
{{div: class=row | ng-app | ng-controller=MachinePricingController}}
    {{div2: class=col-xs-12 col-md-2 | ng-repeat=plan in plans}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=cnrflash | ng-show=plan.recommended}}
                {{div5: class=cnrflash-inner}}
                    {{span: class=cnrflash-label}}
                        MOST @LF POPULR
                    {{span}}
                {{div5}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice"> {[plan.name]} </h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>/mo</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>{[plan.mem]} Memory</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.cores]} 
                        <ng-pluralize count="plan.cores" when="{'one': 'Core', 'other': 'Cores'}">
                    </td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.primary]}GB Storge</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Upgrade SSD up to <br> 100GB at 2/month</td></tr>
                    
                    <tr><td>Transfer 20mb/sec</td></tr>
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a><br> 1 month FREE trial}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}



{{div}}

{{html:

  </div>
  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="profile">
}}


{{div: class=row | ng-app | ng-controller=MachinePricingController}}
